main event: A cigar-shaped UFO was observed by a Cypriot Air Force pilot near Nicosia, Cyprus, on July 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude estimated to be 159,000 feet and at a speed of approximately 45 knots., The UFO had a circular shape from underneath and an inverted cone shape from the side., The sighting was recorded from three different locations in Cyprus., The pilot's visual estimation placed the object's height at 35,000 feet., The size of the UFO was estimated to be approximately the same as a 3000-ton ship.
